name: The rabbit's game
description:
The rabbit game is an exciting FPS game, where you become a gardener. You have your own garden, where you grow a carrots to feed your fluffy friend, rabbit. Your rabbit sits and sleeps well at the center of the yard on a small property in the forest. However, not everyone likes that state of calm. To disrupt this peaceful place, evil gnomes come out of the forrest to achieve one goal, kill your rabbit. Your job is to repel gnom waves. The fate of your beloved rabbit is in your hands. Use carrots, the effect of your great effort and fight them till the end!

Game created by 

Jakub "Radgar" Bera -team leader, programmer, graphic

Przemysław "Pkrolik" Przyłęcki - main programmer

Witosz "Veetosh" Bryła-music, text translation

Instruction

Move – A W S D buton on keyboard

Camrea rotate – mouse

Shooting – left mouse

KeepItALive is a running file

 

You may pick up previously fired carrots.

Ammunition is limited.

You get ammunition when the carrots grow.
